title: Authorization
message: Do you want to authorize <1>{{name}}</1> to access your account?

scopeMessages.basic: This application will access your profile information.
scopeMessages.phone: This application will access your phone number.
scopeMessages.calendar: This application will access your calendar.
scopeMessages.noPassword: This application will <1>not</1> be able to access your password.

errorParameters: We are sorry, but there is an error with your request. Invalid parameters.
errorApp: We're sorry, but there is an error with your request. Application not found.
errorApproval: We're sorry, but there is an error with your request. Application not approved.
errorResponseType: We're sorry, but there is an error with your request. Flow type not supported.
errorScope: We're sorry, but there is an error with your request. The scope you have requested are not approved.
errorRedirectURI: We're sorry, but there is an error with your request. The redirect URI you have requested is not approved.
appInfo: {{name}} is owned by {{owner}}. You should check {{name}}'s <1>Terms of Service</1> and <2>Privacy Policy</2> before proceeding.
